name: Profoundis Labs
overview:
Profoundis helps Enterprises to understand the conversations about their brand/products across the internet and act upon them.

Profoundis Labs Pvt. Ltd (http://www.profoundis.com/) delivers Social Media Analytics enabling the enterprises to listen, analyse and engage in conversations. We offer a range of SaaS products in Buzz listening, Sentiment Analysis, Influencer Analytics and Media Monitoring. Our flagship products include:

Sentiment Analysis: Delivered as API Profoundis offers Indigenous owned & patented Sentiment Analysis which tells you the good, the bad and neutrality in text. Extended leverage of Natural Language processing and Artifical Intelligence empowers our solution to deliver the best-in-class performance. The tool has been trained with over twenty Lakhs datapoints thereby improving the accuracy. Furthermore, the solution is capable of analysing SMS and Tweet Languages.

Sense: The Most Powerful Comment Analysis ever. Sense (http://sense.profoundis.com/) : The most powerful Commenting Analysis solution. It will work along with the popular commenting plugins iike Discus, FB plugin, Wordpress etc. Sense will empower the blog admins. Sense runs a powerful Sentiment analysis which will sense the Tone of the comments. The admins can set Customised Alerts, statistics, contacts of respondents and lot more. Sense is in the Private Beta phase and is free for limited time.

Emotion: You won’t miss anymore conversations Emotion (http://emotion.profoundis.com/) : Emotion is a Business Software that enables the Enterprises to leverage the power of Online data across the web (historical and present). It provides a holistic real time view of the awareness, focus and emotions of millions of users, advocates, influencers and so on. Furthermore it furnishes you with actionable insights and simple click actions through its easy-to-use Interface.

offices.address1: Startup Village, Kinfra Hi Tech Park
